entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Deep River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.4°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
